seo.title: Ticket Management – Paris 2024 Olympic Ticketing
seo.description: Manage tickets for the Paris 2024 Olympic and Paralympic Games events. Add, edit, and delete tickets for competitions and ceremonies.

products.title: Ticket Management
products.name: Ticket name
products.image_here: Drop your image here or click to select
products.create_intro: To create, edit, or duplicate a ticket, all fields are required and you must add an image. The image must be in JPG, JPEG, PNG, GIF, or SVG format and not exceed 2 MB. Once an image is added, you can preview it at the top of the form. Some changes may take a while to apply.

errors.title: Oops… an error occurred
errors.unexpected: An unexpected error occurred while fetching tickets.
errors.save_failed: Failed to save changes. Please try again.
